## Interactive map with leaflet.
 - Main cities in New Zealand.  
 
 - Sources:
    - for cities/population: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_New_Zealand_urban_areas [2017]  
    - for coordinates: https://www.worldatlas.com/oc/nz/cities-in-new-zealand.html  
  
  - Preparation
```{r}
library(leaflet)

df <- data.frame(lat = c(-36.866670, -41.286640, -43.533330),
                 lng = c(174.766670, 174.775570, 172.633330),
                 pop = c(1534700, 412500, 396700),
                 city = c("Auckland", "Wellington", "Christchurch")
)
```

## Resulting Map

```{r}
my_map <- df %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircles(weight=2, radius=sqrt(df$pop)*40, color="darkred", opacity=0.6)
  
my_map
```
